data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schargel, Walter E., Lamar, William W., Passos, Paulo, Valencia, Jorge H., Cisneros-Heredia, Diego F., Campbell, Jonathan A. (2013): A new giant Atractus (Serpentes: Dipsadidae) from Ecuador, with notes on some other large Amazonian congeners. Zootaxa 3721 (5): 455-474, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3721.5.2
